headline: Is A. O. Smith Corporation (AOS) the Best Dividend Growth Stock to Buy and Hold in 2025?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Best Dividend Growth Stocks to Buy and Hold in 2025. In this article, we are going to take a look at where A. O. Smith Corporation (NYSE:AOS) stands against the other dividend growth stocks. Dividend stocks had a challenging year in 2024 as investor interest largely shifted toward […]
